ygData.subject: RE: [sg-everquest] Diable 2
ygData.msgSnippet: To play save, I think once u reach a new teleport point, better do a quit & save  Afterall u can still go back to the same game. FYI,  say I solo in a Bnet
ygData.messageBody:
To play save, I think once u reach a new teleport point, better do a 'quit
& save" Afterall u can still go back to the same game.

FYI, say I solo in a Bnet game (I create a game with pw so others cant
join). If I kena LD, DC or 'quit & save', the game will still be active
for few min.

So u can simply 'quit & save', then rejoin the same game using the same
name and pw. ;)

Good thing abt barb is tat once they reach lvl 16 (or 12?), they got this
skill to increase the %age of finding magical stuffs, shiok. Can use him
to find stuffs and twink other chars, hehe. Now my find potion skill is 6
or 6, meaning out of every corpse I killed, I got dunno 50 or 55% to sqeeze
some potions out, hehe. Not bad for soloer ;)

Ziltus aka Apathaz in D2 Asia
